title: Ticket #4340: SSH to machine
description:
Igor writes: 

Would it be possible to get a "condor_ssh_to_machine" command?
I.e. a tool that allows the admin to login into the startd node, with startd
privileges, using HTCondor protocols to get in?
Of course, one would need to authenticate at the administrative level.

It would come handy in the glidein world, since we have no other easy way to
get into the nodes.

Please let me know if and when this could be done.
